hirdesh@hirdesh 5.5-ex4 $ mpirun -n 4 ./eigen1 mat_out.mtx eigvec.mtx hist.txt -e pi -emaxiter 20000

matrix size = 420 x 420 (7984 nonzero entries)

initial vector x      : all components set to 1
precision             : double
eigensolver           : Power
convergence condition : ||lx-(B^-1)Ax||_2 <= 1.0e-12 * ||lx||_2
matrix storage format : CSR

eigensolver status    : normal end
